DOC.criteria: 1 . Is least 21 year age full legal capacity volunteer ; 2 . Has read sign information consent letter ; 3 . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; 4 . Staff investigational site family member site staff family member currently enrol participant ; 4 . Any subject violates washout period use eye drop 72hrs washout period ; 5 . Has know ocular disease* include active ocular infection , inflammation allergy , especially Salzmann 's nodular degeneration , symptomatic conjunctivochalasis , fixation disparity syndrome ; 6 . Restasis use include least 3 month stable.Used Restasis ( similar topical medication ) within last 6 month ; 7 . Is pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy time enrolment ( verbal confirmation necessary ) ; 9 . Use systemic antihistamine , long continuously least 1 month . Use medication : Systemic Antihistamine ( e.g. , Allegra® , Benadryl® , Claritin® , Dimetapp® , Unisom® , Zyrtec® , etc . ) , Isotretinoin ( e.g. , Accutane® , Roaccutane® , Amnesteem® , Claravis® , Isotroin® , Sotret® ) similar medication ; 10 . Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study ; 11 .
